info.description: This API provides access to data on the Flux platform.
info.title: Flux API

tags.name: Service
tags.description: Health check and basic service operations, such as the ping endpoint.

tags.name: Organization
tags.description: Endpoints for organizations to configure, view, and manage their users, roles, permissions, product category specifications, commercial units, etc.

tags.name: Products
tags.description: Endpoints for managing products, product categories, and specifications.

tags.name: Currency
tags.description: Endpoints for handling currencies, conversions, and related financial data.

tags.name: Entity
tags.description: Endpoints for managing entities such as producers, carriers, marketers, and other stakeholders.

tags.name: Facilities
tags.description: Endpoints for managing facilities such as terminals, batteries, pipelines, etc.

tags.name: Volumes
tags.description: Endpoints for managing volumes, including tickets, meters, and volume transactions.

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized. The API key is missing or invalid.

Forbidden.description: Forbidden. The user does not have the necessary permissions.

InternalServerError.description: Something went wrong on the server.

BadRequest.description: The request was malformed or contained invalid parameters.

error.example: Invalid parameter format: page must be a positive integer.

get.description: Retrieve a list of facilities with pagination and filtering options.
Retrieve details of a specific facility, including its name, type, subtype, status and associated entity.
Retrieve a list of facility types with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of facility types.

get.description: Retrieve a list of facility subtypes with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of facility subtypes.

get.description: Retrieve details about the current organization including associated entities, wells, and facilities.

200.description: A single organization object containing organization details along with related entities, wells, terminals, plants, batteries, stations, systems and pipelines.

get.description: Retrieve a list of users in the current organization with pagination and filtering options.
Retrieve details about a specific user in the current organization including their roles and permissions.

200.description: A single user object containing user details along with related roles and permissions.

get.description: Retrieve a list of user roles in the current organization.
Retrieve a list of user permissions in the current organization.
List commercial facilities in the current organization with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of commercial facilities.

get.description: Retrieve details about a specific commercial facility in the current organization including their related their associated facilities.

200.description: A single commercial facility object containing facility details along with related terminals, batteries, plants, stations, etc.

get.description: Retrieve a list of entities in the current organization with pagination and filtering options.
Retrieve a list of facilities in the current organization with pagination and filtering options.
Retrieve a list of product category specifications in the current organization with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of product category specifications.

get.description: Retrieve a list of currencies with pagination.
Retrieve the exchange rate between two currencies.

parameters.name: from_currency
parameters.description: The symbol of the currency to convert from.

parameters.name: to_currency
parameters.description: The symbol of the currency to convert to.

200.description: The exchange rate between the two currencies.

get.description: Retrieve a list of products with pagination and filtering options.
Retrieve details of a specific product, including its name, category, measurement units and unit conversions.
Retrieve a list of product categories with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of product categories.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific product category, including its name, specifications, and measurement units.
Retrieve a list of measurement units with pagination and filtering options.

200.description: A paginated list of measurement units.

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific measurement unit.
Check the server health.
Retrieve a list of meters.

parameters.name: regulator_id
parameters.description: Filter by regulator ID (searches across connected facilities)

get.description: Retrieve a single meter by ID.
Retrieve a list of ticket statuses with pagination options.

200.description: A paginated list of ticket statuses.

get.description: Retrieve a list of truck tickets with pagination.

parameters.name: pickup_commercial_facility_id
parameters.description: Filter by pickup commercial facility ID

parameters.name: pickup_commercial_entity_id
parameters.description: Filter by pickup commercial entity ID

parameters.name: pickup_facility_operator_id
parameters.description: Filter by pickup facility operator ID

parameters.name: delivery_commercial_facility_id
parameters.description: Filter by delivery commercial facility ID

parameters.name: delivery_commercial_entity_id
parameters.description: Filter by delivery commercial entity ID

parameters.name: delivery_facility_operator_id
parameters.description: Filter by delivery facility operator ID

200.description: A paginated list of truck tickets.

201.description: Truck ticket created (may include validation errors.)

get.description: Retrieve a single truck ticket by ID.

patch.description: Update an existing truck ticket by ID.

get.description: Retrieve a list of tank tickets with pagination.

200.description: A paginated list of tank tickets.

201.description: Tank ticket created (may include validation errors.)

get.description: Retrieve a single tank ticket by ID.

patch.description: Update an existing tank ticket by ID.

get.description: Retrieve a list of meter tickets with pagination.

200.description: A paginated list of meter tickets.

201.description: Meter ticket created (may include validation errors.)

get.description: Retrieve a single meter ticket by ID.

patch.description: Update an existing meter ticket by ID.

get.description: Retrieve a list of wells with pagination and filtering options.
Retrieve details about a specific well including associated entity information.

200.description: A single well object containing well details along with related entity information.

get.description: Retrieve a list of entities with pagination and filtering options.
Retrieve details about a specific entity including associated producer, carrier, marketer and other entity types.

200.description: A single entity object containing entity details along with related entity type information.
